summary:
Version: 0.1

Changes:
> Gold to Septim
> Gold weights 0.022 lb
descriptionHtml:
[b]Version:[/b] 0.1

[b]Changes:[/b]
[list][*] Gold to Septim
[*] Gold weights 0.022 lb[/list]

After having used both [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9072]Gold is Septims[/URL] and [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5203]Realistic Coin Weight[/URL] it felt as though those two didn\'t play well together. So I decided to make a mod combining their changes.
Here it is. Have fun.

This mod renames \"Gold\" to \"Septim\" and changes the global string \"gold\" to \"Septims\" as well. That should replace most if not all instances of \"Gold\" with the more lore friendly term \"Septim\".
It also adjusts the weight of a gold coin or Septim to match that of a similar looking roman one. This adjustment assumes that the unit for weight used by Skyrim is pound.
author: Raszul
